Instruction: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly grease muffin tins or line cups with paper liners.
Coat the blueberries with 1/4 cup of flour, ensuring they are fully covered.
Combine 2 cups of flour, the baking powder, and salt in a small bowl and whisk together.
Blend margarine and gradually add sugar in a large bowl. Beat in eggs, then stir in vanilla. Mix in milk and flour alternatively, folding in berries. Fill muffin cups 2/3 full with batter.
